Room.Name: East Wall
Room.ShortDescription: This is the eastern interior wall of the Tower of Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway branches to the north and south from here, or you can go east toward the castle's main courtyard, where most of the castle activity took place during a happier time. The Witch of Kayleigh murdered the duke who once owned this castle, and drove his followers into the forest.
